extendedInfo.description: Bible reader.Stores the Bible text offline on phone SD card, so you don't need Internet connection to read it.Bible text is English, King James Version (KJV).We cannot test the application on many devices. If you have issues please write.If you find it useful, please vote with 5 stars :-)NOTE: Upon first start the application extracts Bible text on your SD card. If you have no enough space on your SD card not all Bible text will be available for reading.

reviews.title: Thank u
reviews.comment: Very useful. Simple and user friendly. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: ajanthung shitiri

reviews.title: Needs better ui
reviews.comment: Good because it has the exact wording of a bible someone I know has but some new features could be cool. Maybe word or sentence links that explain the part or gives some tidbit of info that wasnt in the paragraph or chapter but has to do with it. Also a sleeker design.
reviews.author: Blake Houghton

reviews.title: The best Bible in Android.
reviews.comment: The only android Bible with zoom function.Good KJV Bible and it\'s just 1.89MB.Search and copy,past are very easy to use and UI is superb.Keep up the good work-\"Brosix\".Also, add the 7 chapters of Songs of Solomon in the next update.God Bless you
reviews.author: Vineeth Abraham

reviews.title: i made it part of my phone
reviews.comment: its good to have a bible in my phone for ready reference. thank u developer. please listen to the preaching of The Appointed Son of God Pastor Apollo C. Quiboloy and you will surely live. PTFTTS. (^^,)
reviews.author: Nicorobin Lacay

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Very nice bible app especially it being offline version, exactly what I wanted. It would be nice if one can select the exact verses that is needed just like the chapters. Anway, it\'s a great app overall.

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: This app is exactly what I needed. I love it that someone can use it in offline mode. It is excellent! Keep up the good work guys, God bless you!!

reviews.title: Missing chapters
reviews.comment: Thought I had my bible everywhere I go!?!? Went to song of Solomon and there is only one chapter present on the app, there are 8 in the bible. Looking for new app!
